docs.text: Welcome to StreamController Thank you for your interest in this app, it is a lot of work developing it. Installation GitHub: This is currently the only way to install StreamController, because it is still in heavy development. git clone https://github.com/Core447/StreamController cd StreamController pip install -r requirements.txt Finished! Open the app by running python3 main.py Flathub: Coming soon!!!
docs.title: Home

docs.text: Thank you for your interest in this app, it is a lot of work developing it.
docs.title: Welcome to StreamController

docs.text: This is currently the only way to install StreamController, because it is still in heavy development. git clone https://github.com/Core447/StreamController cd StreamController pip install -r requirements.txt Finished! Open the app by running python3 main.py
docs.title: GitHub:

docs.text: Developers The StreamController app features advanced plugin support to allow developers as you to easily create plugins in Python . Official Plugins There are several official plugins for StreamController: OBS Media Deck OS Create Your Own Come up with an idea Fork the plugin template Modify the template Submit your plugin to the Store Ok, ok, that was probably a bit too quick, so let's take a closer look at the process. 1. Come up with an idea 2. Download StreamController's source code 2.1 Clone StreamController from GitHub by typing: ```git clone https://github.com/Core447/StreamController``` 2.2 Enter the plugins directory: ```cd plugins``` 2.3 Clone the PluginTemplate from GitHub by typing: ```git clone https://github.com/Core447/PluginTemplate``` This will create a new directory called `PluginTemplate` in the plugins directory with the following files: a) LICENSE: ....
